title: Listener Stories: Vol. 17
description: You guys bring the creepiness in this listeners episode, where we read your murderous and ghosty submissions! This week's stories include a haunted painting, a Canadian murder, an "imaginary" friend, and more...
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
